snippet.title: Hungry Horrors | Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Hungry Horrors | Demo Trailer

🎮 Play the demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2290080/Hungry_Horrors/

Hungry Horrors is a roguelite deckbuilder where you, as a courageous princess, must save your kingdom by satisfying the appetites of legendary creatures from British and Irish folklore. Instead of combat, your weapon is cuisine. Prepare traditional dishes to appease these mythical beings and survive your journey.

Embark on a culinary adventure through pixel-art landscapes inspired by the British and Irish Isles. Encounter creatures like the Buggane, Glaistig, and Grendel, each with unique tastes. Learn their preferences, gather ingredients, and master recipes such as Haggis, Stargazy Pie, and Cranachan to progress.

⸻

🕯️ Key Features:
 • Feed, don’t fight: Strategic feeding replaces traditional combat
 • Folklore-Filled World: Explore environments inspired by British and Irish mythology, encountering iconic creatures and uncovering secrets.
 • Authentic recipes: Cook regional favourites drawn from real-world tradition
 • Deckbuilding depth: Combine dishes, spices, herbs, and utensils
 • Pixel art with personality: Retro visuals with gothic camp and British humour
 • Original soundtrack: Whimsical and eerie themes by composer Henry Taylor

⸻

🧵 Join our community
Got feedback, ideas, or just want to chat about monsters and food?
🍽️ Join the Clumsy Bear Studio Discord:
[https://discord.gg/YOUR-LINK-HERE]

⸻

Developed by Clumsy Bear Studio, a two-person team with a love for gaming, mythology, and food.

📌 Wishlist on Steam to support the project:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2290080/Hungry_Horrors/

🌐 Follow us for updates:
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/ClumsyBearDev
Instagram: https://instagram.com/clumsybearstudio
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@clumsybearstudio
Website: https://hungryhorrorsgame.com

#hungryhorrors #roguelite #deckbuilder #pixelart #indiegame #folklore #mythology #britishfolklore #steamdemo #indiegamedev
